New Records: Yordan Alvarez joined Jeff Bagwell as the only Astros players with 4 straight 30-HR seasons
Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez hit his 29th and 30th home runs of the season in a 7-2 win over the Royals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alvarez hadn't hit a home run at Minute Maid Park in 105 plate appearances
Alvarez's home runs in the fourth and sixth innings against Royals starters Alec Marsh and Sam Long
Others: Alvarez fell victim to the right-center field spot again in the eighth inning
Astros pitching has been stellar in the month of August with a 2.51 ERA and.185 opponents' batting average
